name: Treasures From The Estates
description:
Switch from coffee enthusiast to aficionado in this unique coffee appreciation
experience. Delve into the world of premium Indian Estate Coffees, and learn
the nuances of brewing and tasting single-origin brews, including a cold one.

This immersive experience helps you develop a keen sense of understanding
about unique Indian coffees and what makes them special. We will cover three
brewing methods - AeroPress, FrenchPress and Pour Over.

**_Join us for the Brunch edit. Enjoy Trove’s signature coffee brewing
experience alongside a special breakfast menu curated by Chef Ashley of Monkey
Bar._**

Attendees can opt for either a vegetarian or non-vegetarian set breakfast
menu, which will include all items mentioned below.

  * **Veg Meal:** Chole Bhature, Mini Fruit Bowl, and Mini Muffin.
  * **Non Veg Meal:** Mushroom & Cheese Omelette (with a slice of bread, butter & side salad), Mini Muesli Bowl, and Mini Muffin.

Fresh watermelon juice will be served to all attendees.

name: Echoes of Calm
description:
The use of sound for healing dates back thousands of years to various ancient
cultures. Indigenous peoples have long used drums, chanting, and other
instruments for ceremonial and therapeutic purposes. These practices were
often tied to spiritual rituals and were believed to have healing properties.

This immersive sound bath experience is built on the enduring belief in the
power of sound, and sets you on the path to healing, relaxation, and spiritual
growth.

name: Oasis Of Scents
description:
An ode to the masterful craft of perfume making and the country's best noses,
this experience will have you develop a discerning sense of smell, understand
the nuances of perfumery as a science and art, as well as how fragrances
passively contribute to our overall experiences to create a lasting memory.

_**The experience includes navigating through various fragrance notes to
formulate your own customised bottle of perfume, under the guidance of an
expert.**_

name: Aerial Playground
description:
Inspired by ancient yogic traditions, Airo Yoga takes flight for the modern
explorer. Emerging in the 2000s, it reimagines classic poses with the playful
freedom of a custom-designed aerial hammock.

Airo Yoga, a specific style within Aerial Yoga, incorporates the flowing
sequences of Vinyasa yoga, the core control of Pilates, the thrill of
inversions, and the playful connection of acro play. The result creates a
truly exhilarating and accessible practice that uses Eastern philosophies to
offer a unique path to strength, mindfulness, and a joyful flight for all.

name: Polar Plunge
description:
Cold plunges have a rich history, dating back to ancient civilisations like
Egypt, Greece, and Rome, where it was revered for its healing properties.
Today, this practice is globally recognised for its numerous therapeutic and
wellness benefits.

A cold plunge, also known as an ice bath, involves immersing the body in cold
water, typically at temperatures between 5-7°C, for a brief period. It is
widely used by athletes and fitness enthusiasts to aid recovery and enhance
physical and mental health.

_**This immersive experience helps you take the plunge through a series of
activities, guided by an expert.**_

location.name: Runway 27
location.address: Yemalur, Off Old Airport Road, Bangalore

name: A Mini Indulgence
description:
Cupcakes first appeared in 1796 when Amelia Simmons’ cookbook referenced “a
light cake to bake in small cups.” What started as a practical way to portion
batter soon evolved into a global favourite, with flavours and techniques
reflecting diverse cultures.

Once a simple teatime treat, these portable cakes have taken over bakeries,
celebrations, and social media, transforming into edible art with intricate
piping, vibrant colours, and rich flavours. Innovations in baking have led to
the infusion of jams, chocolates, and creams into these treats while
preserving their delicate texture.

**Immerse yourself in a hands-on Cupcake Baking & Icing Experience, and
explore the art of baking light, fluffy cupcakes from scratch. Learn expert
techniques for icing with precision and creativity, all while indulging in
delightful treats that complement and elevate your creations.**
